main_image.description: A trial-and-error 2D platformer built in Godot, where you play as a light source, collecting batteries to stay alive. Created from the ground up in just four days during a game jam, this project was a fun and experimental challenge.

description_short: A 2D platformer where you play as a light source and must collect batteries to stay alive.
quote: Play the game on our itch.io!
